vk_group_preset_example.description: VK Output Preset for uploading to a VK Group/Public page
notes: group_id: ID вашей группы/паблика (найти в URL: vk.com/public123456 → 123456)
album_id: ID альбома в группе (создать через VK → Видео → Создать альбом)
wallpost: true - публиковать на стене группы при загрузке

vk_personal_preset_example.description: VK Output Preset for uploading to personal account (no group)
notes: NO group_id = upload to personal account
album_id: ID личного альбома (vk.com/video → Мои альбомы)

how_to_find_group_id.description: How to find VK group_id and album_id
steps: - Go to your group page in VK
- URL will be: vk.com/public123456 or vk.com/club123456
- Make sure you are admin/editor of the group
- Create album in group: Group page → Videos → Create album
- Get album_id from URL as above

update_preset_with_group_id.description: Update existing VK preset to add group_id
update_preset_with_group_id.command: curl -X 'PATCH' 'http://0.0.0.0:8000/api/v1/presets/output/2' -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"preset_metadata": {"group_id": "123456", "album_id": "60", "privacy_view": 0, "privacy_comment": 0, "no_comments": false, "wallpost": false}}'

create_new_vk_preset.description: Create new VK preset for group uploads
create_new_vk_preset.command: curl -X 'POST' 'http://0.0.0.0:8000/api/v1/presets/output' -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"name": "VK Group Uploads", "platform": "vk", "credential_id": 14, "preset_metadata": {"group_id": "123456", "album_id": "60", "privacy_view": 0}}'
